API.ADK

Class ResponseBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • API.ADK.ResponseBuffer

  • public class ResponseBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    The Response buffer used to communicate between the receive thread and the CANDevice class.
    Author:
    hroesdiyono
